description: Research current renewable energy policies in India
Gather data on India's renewable energy production and consumption trends

Research the impact of 2026 carbon taxes on European manufacturing and draft a risk assessment.

description: Research current European manufacturing industry structure and key players.

Draft a preliminary risk assessment framework for the impact of 2026 carbon taxes on European manufacturing.

Design a roadmap for adopting AI copilots in a mid-sized IT services company over the next 3 years.

description: Conduct a company-wide survey to assess current pain points and areas where AI copilots can provide the most value.

Develop a training program for employees on how to effectively work with AI copilots, including data preparation, model selection, and integration.
Establish a governance framework for AI copilot adoption, including data security, ethics, and compliance considerations.
